title: Initialize Project Repository and Development Environment
description:
Set up version control, create project structure, and configure development environment for all team members.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
1. Git repository created with main and develop branches
2. Project structure with frontend, backend, and documentation folders
3. Development environment setup guide documented
4. All team members can clone and run the project locally
5. CI/CD pipeline skeleton configured

**Technical Requirements:**
- Use Git for version control
- Create README.md with setup instructions
- Configure .gitignore for all environments
- Set up package.json/npm for dependency management
review_by_product_manager: Approved - Ensure all team members have access

title: Define Website Requirements and User Stories
description:
Document detailed requirements, user personas, and user stories for the Complete Automate website.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
1. Complete requirements document created
2. 3-5 user personas defined with goals and pain points
3. Minimum 15 user stories documented with acceptance criteria
4. Sitemap created showing all pages and navigation structure
5. Content inventory and requirements documented

**Definition of Done:**
- Requirements document reviewed and approved by stakeholders
- User stories prioritized using MoSCoW method
- All team members understand the project scope
review_by_product_manager: Approved - Focus on AI automation service showcase

title: Create Wireframes and Design System
description:
Design wireframes, create visual design system, and establish brand consistency.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
1. Low-fidelity wireframes for all pages (mobile and desktop)
2. High-fidelity mockups with Complete Automate branding
3. Design system with color palette, typography, and components
4. Style guide documenting all design decisions
5. Interactive prototypes for key user flows

**Technical Requirements:**
- Use Figma or Adobe XD for design
- Design for mobile-first responsive approach
- Ensure accessibility compliance (WCAG 2.1)
- Create reusable component library
review_by_product_manager: Approved - Emphasize modern, professional AI automation aesthetic

title: Set Up Frontend Framework and Base Components
description:
Initialize frontend framework, configure build tools, and create base components.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
1. React/Next.js project initialized with TypeScript
2. Build configuration (Webpack/Vite) optimized for production
3. Base layout components created (Header, Footer, Navigation)
4. Responsive grid system implemented
5. Global styles and theme configuration

**Technical Requirements:**
- Use Next.js 14+ with App Router
- Implement TypeScript for type safety
- Configure Tailwind CSS for styling
- Set up ESLint and Prettier for code quality
review_by_product_manager: Approved - Ensure fast loading and SEO optimization

title: Design Backend System Architecture
description:
Design and document backend architecture, API structure, and database schema.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
1. System architecture diagram created
2. API endpoints defined with REST/GraphQL specifications
3. Database schema designed with relationships
4. Authentication and authorization flow documented
5. Third-party service integrations planned

**Technical Requirements:**
- Use Node.js with Express/Fastify
- Design RESTful API with OpenAPI/Swagger documentation
- Plan PostgreSQL/MongoDB database structure
- Design JWT-based authentication system
review_by_product_manager: Approved - Focus on scalability for future features

title: Set Up Database and Create Initial Schema
description:
Configure database, create tables/collections, and set up migrations.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
1. Database instance provisioned (local and staging)
2. All tables/collections created with proper indexes
3. Migration scripts for schema changes
4. Seed data for development environment
5. Backup and recovery procedures documented

**Technical Requirements:**
- Use PostgreSQL for relational data
- Implement Prisma ORM for database access
- Create migration scripts for version control
- Set up database connection pooling
review_by_product_manager: Approved - Ensure data security and compliance

title: Develop Homepage with Hero Section
description:

**Acceptance Criteria:**

2. Value proposition showcasing AI automation benefits
3. Clear call-to-action buttons
4. Responsive design for all screen sizes
5. Performance optimized (Lighthouse score >90)

**Technical Requirements:**

- Optimize for Core Web Vitals
- Add smooth animations and transitions
- Ensure accessibility compliance
review_by_product_manager: Approved - Highlight AI automation expertise and client success

title: Create Services Showcase Page

title: Implement User Authentication API
description:

**Technical Requirements:**

- Use JWT for stateless authentication
- Add rate limiting for security
- Implement refresh token rotation
review_by_product_manager: Approved - Ensure enterprise-grade security

title: Create Contact Form API Endpoints
